name: Slider.Root

value.description: The current value of the slider.

disabled.description: Whether or not the switch is disabled.

max.description: The maximum value of the slider.

min.description: The minimum value of the slider.

step.description: The step value of the slider.

dir.description: The reading direction of the slider. If set to 'rtl', the slider will be reversed for both 'horizontal' and 'vertical' orientations.
dir.description_zh: 滑块的读取方向。如果设置为“rtl”，则滑块将反转为“水平”和“垂直”方向。

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: 是否对此组件使用渲染委派。

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: 正在呈现的基础 DOM 元素。您可以绑定到此元素以编程方式与元素进行交互。

description: The root slider component which contains the remaining slider components.

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: A callback function called when the value state of the slider changes.
events.description_zh: A callback function called when the value state of the slider changes.

slots.name: ticks
slots.description: The tick builders to pass to the individual Slider.Tick components.
slots.description_zh: 要传递给各个 Slider.Tick 组件的刻度生成器。

slots.name: thumbs
slots.description: The thumb builders to pass to the individual Slider.Thumb components.
slots.description_zh: 要传递给各个 Slider.Thumb 组件的拇指生成器。

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: 如果使用带有委托的 asChild 属性，则要应用于元素的构建器属性和操作。
